articles.description: Reaction to Scotland's 1-0 defeat to Hungary which sees them eliminated from Euro 2024, plus all the latest news from the tournament.
articles.title: Euro 2024 live: Reaction as Scotland eliminated after Hungary defeat

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries and follow live text coverage from day two of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day two - scores, radio & text

articles.description: South Africa book their place in the T20 World Cup semi-finals with a nervy three-wicket win over co-hosts West Indies in a winner-takes-all Super 8s match.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: South Africa edge past West Indies to make semi-finals

articles.description: Spanish football expert Guillem Balague charts how Croatia and Real Madrid's Luka Modric defied the odds to become one of the game's very best.
articles.title: Luka Modric: How Croatia idol defied the odds to become one of football's greatest players

articles.description: England bowler Chris Jordan stars on the return to his birthplace Barbados to help his team into the T20 World Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Chris Jordan delivers on Barbados return as England reach semi-finals

articles.description: South Korea's Amy Yang wins the KPMG Women's PGA Championship by three strokes to claim her first major title.
articles.title: Women's PGA Championship: Amy Yang wins first major

articles.description: BBC Sport pundit Pat Nevin ponders what is next for the Scotland squad and Steve Clarke after their Euro 2024 exit.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Time for Scotland rebuild? Or can team reach World Cup?

articles.description: Andy Murray has not made a decision on whether he will be fit enough to make a planned Wimbledon farewell next week.
articles.title: Andy Murray not made decision on Wimbledon 2024 after back procedure

articles.description: Lando Norris still has hopes of challenging Max Verstappen for the Formula 1 title despite losing out to the Dutchman in the Spanish Grand Prix.
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris needs to 'put it all together' to beat Max Verstappen

articles.description: Darwin Nunez scores as Uruguay begin their 2024 Copa America campaign with a 3-1 win over Panama.
articles.title: Copa America: Darwin Nunez scores as Uruguay begin campaign with win over Panama
